definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Construct your own sentences using the words that you have noted in your dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 用你在個人詞庫中所寫下的單詞進行遣詞造句。

sentences.english: Thus, understanding these complex factors helps to build the lexicon theory.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解這些複雜因素，有助於“詞庫”理論的建構。

sentences.english: Mimetic word has its special glamour in Chinese vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 象聲詞是漢語詞庫中獨具魅力的一類詞。

sentences.english: This dictionary is revised from Treasures of English Words .
sentences.chinese: 這本詞典是根據《英語詞庫》修訂而成的。

sentences.english: Use a dictionary or a thesaurus as needed. Do a spell check.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，一定要使用字典或者詞庫。

sentences.english: I would come back from school, and then sit for an hour or two and noted down new words and added them to my collection.
sentences.chinese: 放學後我就用一兩個小時來摘錄生詞，擴大我的詞庫。

definition: lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
to gesticulate/to make lively gestures (while talking)/also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚
